item.title: New Course: Introduction to Ancient Philosophy
item.description: Explore the foundational ideas of Western philosophy from ancient Greece to the Hellenistic period with Dr. Sarah Mitchell.
item.content:encoded:
Journey through the philosophical foundations that shaped Western thought in our comprehensive 12-week course on Ancient Philosophy.

What You'll Learn:

  • Pre-Socratic philosophers and the search for first principles
  • Socratic method and the examined life
  • Plato's Theory of Forms and the Republic
  • Aristotle's logic, ethics, and politics
  • Hellenistic schools: Stoicism, Epicureanism, and Skepticism

Led by Dr. Sarah Mitchell, a classical philosophy scholar, this course bridges ancient wisdom with modern challenges.

Duration: 12 weeks | Level: Beginner | Price: $299
item.dc:creator: Dr. Sarah Mitchell

item.title: AI Ethics: Building Humane Technology
item.description: Former OpenAI ethics researcher Dr. Dario Chen explores the ethical implications of artificial intelligence and how to build technology that serves humanity.
item.content:encoded:
As AI transforms our world, understanding its ethical implications becomes crucial for every professional.

Course Highlights:

  • The moral weight of code and AI's impact on human autonomy
  • Identifying and addressing bias in AI systems
  • Privacy, surveillance, and data ethics
  • Building inclusive and fair AI systems

Learn from Dr. Dario Chen, former lead ethics researcher at OpenAI with 5 years of experience developing ethical frameworks for large language models.

Duration: 8 weeks | Level: Beginner | Price: $349
item.dc:creator: Dr. Dario Chen

item.title: Global Expansion: New Learning Centers in Asia Pacific
item.description: HumanEdge Academy announces strategic expansion into South Korea, Japan, and Southeast Asia with localized humanities education programs.
item.content:encoded:
We're excited to announce our expansion into the Asia Pacific region, starting with South Korea in August 2025.

Expansion Timeline:

  • August 2025: South Korea - Seoul, Incheon, Busan centers
  • September 2025: Japan - Tokyo, Osaka centers
  • October 2025: Singapore and Bangkok centers
  • November 2025: India - Mumbai, Bangalore centers

Each center will offer localized curriculum combining global humanities education with regional philosophical traditions and cultural perspectives.

Partnership opportunities are now open for qualified education organizations and franchise operators.

item.title: Stoicism and Digital Resilience: Navigate the Modern World with Ancient Wisdom
item.description: Learn how ancient Stoic wisdom can help you maintain inner peace and rational thinking in our hyperconnected, AI-driven world.
item.content:encoded:
Discover how the teachings of Marcus Aurelius, Epictetus, and Seneca remain profoundly relevant in the digital age.

Why Stoicism Matters Today:

  • Managing digital anxiety and information overload
  • Building resilience against social media pressures
  • Finding meaning in technological disruption
  • Developing unshakeable inner peace

Dr. Alexandra Reed, former Tesla AI Ethics Advisor and author of "Digital Stoicism," guides you through practical applications of Stoic philosophy.

Duration: 8 weeks | Level: Beginner | Price: $249
item.dc:creator: Dr. Alexandra Reed

item.title: Leading Humans in the Age of Artificial Intelligence
item.description: Transform your leadership approach for AI-augmented teams with insights from former Microsoft VP Dr. Michael Park.
item.content:encoded:
As AI transforms the workplace, leaders must evolve to guide human-AI collaborative teams effectively.

Master These Critical Skills:

  • Managing human-AI team dynamics
  • Addressing automation anxiety and building trust
  • Preserving human culture in digital workplaces
  • Ethical leadership in AI implementation
  • Strategic workforce planning for the AI era

Dr. Michael Park, who led Microsoft's AI division for 7 years managing 500+ engineers, shares proven strategies for human-centered leadership.

Duration: 12 weeks | Level: Advanced | Price: $499
item.dc:creator: Dr. Michael Park

item.title: Research Report: The Rising Demand for Humanities Skills in the AI Economy
item.description: Our latest research reveals that 73% of Fortune 500 companies now prioritize humanities skills in their hiring and training programs.
item.content:encoded:
New research from HumanEdge Academy's Research Institute shows a dramatic shift in corporate learning priorities.

Key Findings:

  • 73% of Fortune 500 companies actively seek humanities-trained professionals
  • Critical thinking and ethical reasoning top the list of desired skills
  • Companies with humanities-focused L&D programs report 45% higher innovation metrics
  • Philosophy and ethics training reduces AI implementation risks by 60%

The comprehensive report, based on surveys of 500+ companies and 10,000+ professionals, demonstrates the growing recognition that human judgment, creativity, and ethical reasoning are irreplaceable in the AI era.

Download the full report at our research center.
